title: Heterolytic tide-dominated sedimentary facies and depositional environment: An Example from the Boka Bil formation, Sitapahar anticline, Bangladesh
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Sohag Ali, Numair Ahmed Siddiqui, AKM Eahsanul Haque, Nisar Ahmed, Mohamed A.K. El-Ghali, Md Yeasin Arafath, Mizanur Rahman, Mrinal Kanti Roy, Alidu Rashid
